title: Noces rouges
overview: In Provence, it's party time: Sandra, whose mother is a renowned restaurateur, is getting married. On this occasion, Alice is back after four years of absence. But the joy of reunion is short: a few hours after the ceremony, the bride is found dead, down a cliff. But what looks like suicide at first glance could be a murder. Vincent, a relative of the family, then begins to investigate and, raising the curtain of appearances, falls on dark family secrets...
